sen.e: It is a cooking of materials such as filet of cutlassfish or mackerel, beef, chicken, koyadofu (freeze-dried been curd) coated with sesame seeds and deep-fried to be crispy.

sen.j: 著名な茶人、千利休がゴマを使った料理を好んだという言い伝えからこの名がついたとされる。
sen.e: It is said that this name is based on a legend that a famous chajin SEN no Rikyu liked cooking with sesame.
